channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The 11 best Black Friday Lego Star Wars deals to shop right now
item.description: This Black Friday, Walmart is offering major savings on a bunch of gadgets, including Lego sets.

item.title: My favourite Ninja coffee maker is cheaper than ever with this record-breaking Black Friday deal
item.description: The Ninja Prestige DualBrew System was great value at full price, and for Black Friday it's even cheaper.

item.title: Signal déploie sa fonction de sauvegarde des conversations sur iOS et Android : comment en profiter gratuitement ?
item.description: Bien décidé à venir concurrencer WhatsApp sur le terrain des applis de discussions instantanées, Signal vient de déployer largement sa fonction de sauvegarde des discussions pour ne plus perdre vos messages préférés.

item.title: Branch makes some superb home office equipment - and it's having a big Black Friday sale now with some great deals
item.description: Score a great Black Friday deal on these great home office hardware offers.

item.title: Ce n’est pas fini : la surveillance de vos messages privés pourrait revenir en Europe
item.description: Après une longue mobilisation, Bruxelles a formellement écarté son projet de surveillance automatique des messageries privées. Mais si le règlement Chat Control a été évacué, il pourrait bien revenir par la petite porte.

item.title: Le télescope connecté Vespera II baisse son prix à l’occasion du Black Friday
item.description: Avec sa facilité de transport et de prise en main, le Vespera II peut rapidement devenir une référence en matière d'astrophotographie. En cette Black Friday Week, il passe de 1 590 euros à 1 490 euros chez Nature & Découvertes.

item.title: Nanoleaf's light panels gave my gaming desk a much-needed glow-up, and they're at a record-low price for Black Friday
item.description: Nanoleaf's smart lights are popular for gaming and home theater fans for their great screen-mirroring software, and right now, there's a huge sale on a range of popular devices, but I'm most interested in stocking up on my favorites.

item.title: Ignoring Your Sleep Apnea? It Could Be Messing With Your Brain
item.description: New research shows a worrying connection between untreated apnea and a well-known neurodegenerative disorder.

item.title: Apple’s AirPods 4 are on sale starting at just $69 for Black Friday
item.description: It was only just a couple of weeks ago that Apple’s AirPods 4 dropped to a new low price; however, if you missed out on the former deal, you now have a chance to snag the excellent entry-level earbuds for even less. Right now, the AirPods 4 are on sale for around $69 ($60 off) […]

item.title: NordVPN just aced an independent lab evaluation, and the timing couldn't be better
item.description: A new WCL evaluation shows NordVPN outperforming rivals in speed, leak protection, and system impact. And it's now on sale.

item.title: Act fast, gamers – the Steam Deck and Legion Go S both just got huge price cuts for Black Friday
item.description: There's a lot for us handheld gamers to love this Black Friday, and these Steam Deck and Legion Go S deals are one of them.

item.title: Black Friday : quelles sont les meilleures offres sur Amazon, Boulanger, Fnac, Darty… ?
item.description: La Black Friday Week bat son plein chez Amazon, Fnac, Darty, Boulanger et Cdiscount. C’est le moment parfait pour bénéficier des meilleures réductions sur les smartphones, tablettes, ordinateurs portables ou téléviseurs. Découvrez ici, en temps réel, les offres tech les plus attractives du moment.

item.title: Conduite autonome : Tesla tente un coup de pression, les Pays-Bas recadrent sèchement Elon Musk
item.description: L'entreprise d'Elon Musk pensait pouvoir tordre le bras des régulateurs européens avec un simple tweet. Raté. L'autorité néerlandaise (RDW) a fermement démenti l'arrivée validée du FSD pour 2026 et demande aux fans de Tesla d'arrêter le harcèlement.

item.title: Microsoft’s AI chatbot Copilot leaves WhatsApp on January 15
item.description: WhatsApp's new platform policies ban general-purpose AI chatbots like Copilot from using its service.

item.title: Steam's first-ever Black Friday sale has officially kicked off and these discounts are sure to make your wallet cry
item.description: Valve has launched its first-ever Black Friday Steam sale, offering discounts on thousands of games from now until December 1.

item.title: Nurses are rallying to defend their profession after nursing degrees were deemed not ‘professional’
item.description: “To go from ‘healthcare hero’ to not being recognized as a professional is such a back-handed slap,” one registered nurse told ‘Fast Company.’ The Trump administration left nursing off a list of “professional” degrees in a move that could directly limit how future nurses will finance their education.

item.title: YouTube va vous aider à faire le ménage dans vos recommandations de vidéos, voici comment
item.description: YouTube teste un nouveau moyen pour aider les spectateurs à obtenir des recommandations de vidéos pertinentes sur leur page d'accueil.

item.title: « Les batteries touchées peuvent s’enflammer et exploser » : au bord de la faillite, la marque de vélos électriques Rad Power est touchée par un rappel au pire moment
item.description: Déjà en proie à des difficultés financières importantes, la marque américaine de vélos électriques Rad Power Bikes est touchée par un rappel de certaines de ses batteries. Rappel qu’elle ne peut gérer, faute de fonds suffisants.

item.title: AI now writes more than half of new online articles. What’s next for human authorship?
item.description: AI appears to be most useful when the writing in question is low-stakes and formulaic. The line between human and machine authorship is blurring, particularly as it’s become increasingly difficult to tell whether something was written by a person or AI.

Choosing the right game or movie to gift is tough, though, especially if you don't have an exact read […]

item.title: Welcome to Derry’s most shocking moment is in episode 5 – actor admits ‘it was the most callous thing I could possibly do’
item.description: Following on from Pennywise's return, actor James Remar speaks about his character's obsession with Pennywise and his difficult behavior.

item.title: Your AI use policy is solving the wrong problem
item.description: To fix it, you need a mindset shift. When a company with tens of thousands of software engineers found that uptake of a new AI-powered tool was lagging well below 50%, they wanted to know why. It turned out that the problem wasn’t the technology itself. What was holding the company back was a mindset that saw AI use as akin to cheating. Those who used the tool were perceived as less skilled than their colleagues, even when their work output was identical. Not surprisingly, most of the engineers chose not to risk their reputations and carried on working in the traditional way....

item.title: Oubliez Google et Chrome : ce nouveau navigateur web n’est ni basé sur Chrome, ni sur Firefox
item.description: Les créateurs du moteur de recherche Kagi lancent Orion, un tout nouveau navigateur web. Il sort d'abord sur macOS, mais des versions Windows et Linux sont en développement.

item.title: China’s Pony AI plans to triple global robotaxi fleet by the end of 2026
item.description: The Chinese autonomous vehicle company Pony.ai has global ambitions and plans to build a 3,000-strong robotaxi fleet to meet them.

item.title: Mission de sauvetage réussie : la Chine livre une capsule de secours à sa station spatiale Tiangong
item.description: Frayeur et réactivité dans l'espace. Après une collision avec un débris orbital, la Chine a dû lancer en urgence une mission non habitée pour sécuriser le retour de ses astronautes. Le vaisseau Shenzhou-22 est bien arrivé à bon port ce 25 novembre.

item.title: Test du Ugreen NASync DXP4800 Plus : Synology et QNAP ont clairement du souci à se faire
item.description: J'ai passé deux mois avec le Ugreen DXP4800 Plus, un NAS à 700 euros qui promet beaucoup sur le papier. Processeur Intel 12ᵉ génération, RAM DDR5, Ethernet 10 Gigabit : des caractéristiques qu'on trouve habituellement à 1000 euros chez Synology ou QNAP.

item.description: There's only one console to buy this Black Friday, with a PS5 now costing only a tenner more than an Xbox Series S.

item.title: Arturia’s AstroLab 37 crams 44 synths into a tiny keyboard
item.description: Last year, Arturia launched its first stage keyboard, AstroLab. Unlike a synthesizer, stage keyboards are more focused on delivering performance-ready presets than sound design. They're geared towards touring and performing musicians who need access to a range of sounds with minimal fuss, rather than bedroom tinkerers. But, while the first entries in the series were […]...

item.title: Tesla faces lawsuit for these lethal design flaws in Washington State crash
item.description: The lawsuit seeks a jury trial along with wrongful death damages for both Jeff Dennis and his late wife’s estate. Design flaws caused a Tesla Model 3 to suddenly accelerate out of control before it crashed into a utility pole and burst into flames, killing a woman and severely injuring her husband, a lawsuit filed in federal court alleges.Another defect with the door handle design thwarted bystanders who were trying to rescue the driver, Jeff Dennis, and his wife, Wendy, from the car, according to the lawsuit filed Friday in U.S. District Court for the Western District of Washington.Wendy Denn...

item.title: Go home everyone, the Black Friday OLED TVs deals war has just been won by LG
item.description: The LG C5 is one of the headline TVs of Black Friday, and Crampton & Moore just dropped the 55-inch model to its lowest price to date.

item.title: Une semaine sans Facebook, et tout va mieux : l’étude interne gênante que Meta aurait préféré oublier
item.description: Meta savait que couper Facebook faisait du bien à ses utilisateurs. Le géant des réseaux sociaux aurait pourtant choisi de taire une étude interne qui établissait un lien clair entre son réseau social et des effets néfastes sur la santé mentale, selon une plainte déposée aux États-Unis.

item.title: Speechify adds voice typing and voice assistant to its Chrome extension
item.description: In the last 12 months, there has been a proliferation of voice detection tools, thanks to overall quality improvement in speech recognition models. Speechify is hitching its wagon to this train and launching its own dictation tool with support for English.

item.title: What to know about Trump’s order for the AI project ‘Genesis Mission’
item.description: ‘Genesis Mission’ is part of an executive order that directs the Department of Energy and national labs to build a digital platform to consolidate U.S. scientific data. President Donald Trump is directing the federal government to combine efforts with tech companies and universities to convert government data into scientific discoveries, acting on his push to make artificial intelligence the engine of the nation’s economic future.Trump unveiled the “Genesis Mission” as part of an executive order he signed Monday that directs the Department of Energy and national labs to build a digital platfor...
